__Early preview v0.1__

Deep dive into health data architecture, data flows, and data capabilities across NHS England, through detailed schematics and explainers.

This is a early proof of concept and a 'living document' that we are continually adding to. Feedback and collaboration are invited.

Previous version in [Zhang, Morley et al., 2023](https://www.thelancet.com/journals/landig/article/PIIS2589-7500(23)00157-7/fulltext)
